description:
Ever struggled to grab your water bottle on a rainy day? The Gripper's textured top helps you get solid grip, no matter how heavy the downpour. The high-flow valve lets you hydrate quickly so you can focus on extending your lead.

  • Unique textured surface offers improved grip
  • Soft, squeezable body
  • Silicone mouthpiece and high-flow valve won't leave you thirsty
  • BPA-free. Safe for fluids between 0 and 70°C
name: Cannondale Gripper Stacked Water Bottle 750ml
